attributes.action: answer criticisms that Heathrow is "one of the worst in Europe"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I read today on AOL that in Heathrow, 

"If you look at the fabric of the building, if you look at where customers check in - missing light bulbs, duck tape on the floor ... I would have to say that Heathrow is in many ways the worst of all the airports that my company flies to in Europe.But Heathrow operator BAA said things were improving and it would invest £4 billion over five years to improve  the airport. 

Fine ! But it doesn't take millions of pounds and staff to address the immeadiate issues highlighted in the report.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
